data.name: Space Merchants Arena
data.description:
Space Merchants Arena is a VR multiplayer space shooter game, in which futuristic spaceships engage in intense dogfights or tactical play. Earn experience points, improve your skills and progress to new ranks in global leaderboard table. Collect gold and buy new weapons and equipment.

– 3 game modes: Free for all / Team battle (red vs blue) / Capture the Artifact
– 4 maps: Faarlands, Tristar, Jupiter, Naussike system
– Global leaderboard of best ranking players
– 23 achievements
– RPG-like skills and stats
– Shop for weapons and equipment

Controls
– You can steer your ship by grabbing the stick with your right hand controller. OR you can use your right thumbstick instead, if you go to Options/Graphics and uncheck "Turning with hand".
– You can change your ship's speed by grabbing throttle handle with your left hand controller, or by using thumbstick on your left controller (this is recommended).
– Use triggers for firing primary and secondary weapons, use button B to go back.
